overview: Written and directed Joel and Ethan Coen (Fargo, The Big Lebowski), the Paris set Tuileries is an example from the section of short films by famous directors. Tuileries was commissioned alongside True and a host of other short films by the French capital for its Paris, Je T'Aime (Paris, I Love You) anthology. Steve Buscemi is a tourist in the eponymous metro station, which is located near The Louvre. He mistakenly catches eyes with a woman on the opposite platform - an action that causes her boyfriend some considerable annoyance.
title: Tuileries
